price: 44. Bariidaoodu Maalintay (Alle) la Kulmi  waa Salaam: Nabad ahaada, Wuxuuna u diyaariyey abaal gud sharaf badan (Janno).
arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salāmun wa-aʿadda lahum ajran karīman
